comments.comment: Defines an interface 'AspectRatioProps' for component properties.
Optional 'ratio' prop specifying the aspect ratio, as a number.
Optional 'children' prop that can be of type ReactNode, defining the child components.
Allows for an indefinite number of additional properties with any types, adding flexibility to the props.
Declaration of a functional component named AspectRatioView.
Set a default aspect ratio of 16:9 if no ratio is provided as a prop.
children prop used to render enclosed components.
Spread the rest of the props to inherit additional properties.
AspectRatioProps used as the type for the component props.
Declaration of the AspectRatioComponent functional component with destructured props.
Destructuring the AspectRatioProps to extract 'ratio', 'children', and other props.
Opening of the functional component's body.
Beginning of the return statement in the functional component.
End of the return statement in the functional component.
Exporting the AspectRatioComponent as named export 'AspectRatio'.
